import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import img from "../../assets/doremon.png" import "./Post.css" import Comment from "./Comment" import FavoriteBorderIcon from '@mui/icons-material/FavoriteBorder'; import axios from 'axios'; import { BASE_URL } from '../../lib/constant'; function Post({ post }) { const PF = process.env.PUBLIC_URL const [user, setUser] = useState() const getUser = async () => { const res = await axios.get(`${BASE_URL}/user?userId=${post.userId}`) console.log(res) setUser(res) } useEffect(() => { getUser() }, []) return (

username

{/* */}
{user.username}

{post.desc}

) } export default Post
